targets.expr: max by (pod) (max_over_time(timestamp(container_start_time_seconds{job="kubelet",pod=~"^job-.+",container!="POD",image!=""})[$__range:15s])) - on(pod) max by(pod) (max_over_time(container_start_time_seconds{job="kubelet",pod=~"^job-.+",container!="POD",image!=""}[$__range])) * on(pod) max by(pod) (max_over_time(kube_pod_labels{job="kube-state-metrics",label_platform_neuromation_io_user=~"^$user_name$"}[$__range])) > 0
